body.name: Yaheetech Mid-Century Accent Chairs, Modern Upholstered Living Room Chair, Cozy Armchair Button Tufted Back and Wood Legs for Bedroom/Office/Cafe, Yellow
deliveryMessages: $49.99 delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 22 hrs 57 mins.
features: 【Comfortable Seat】 This accent chair will become your new favorite seat in the house. Its padded cushion is firm yet soft for ultimate coziness. With a gently slanted design, the solid backrest provides support for your spine. There are also convenient armrests for your pleasure and luxury.

【Modern Design】With the stylish and modern design, the fabric armchair gives your room a retro feel with the modern shape and adds a touch of elegance to your room. Strong lines and a modern style, both create a favorite lounging spot。

【Sturdy Legs】This armchair has durable rubberwood legs that are easy to clean and come with foot pads to balance uneven floors and protect your valuable wood floors. The legs are strong enough to provide a firm foundation for your recliner and can support up to 136kg/300lb.
【Perfect for Small Space】Our mid-century armchair is easy to put together in a snap and the perfect size is great for small spaces, like sunroom, living room, reading corner.

【Versatility】 This charming armchair features a streamlined modern look, Mid-century inspired design touches and durable construction that stands up to daily life. Its simplicity coordinates with different styles, making it adds a fashion style to your home or office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’d say a very good price. The item came and was easy to assemble. It’s comfortable, and looks easy to clean. Nice and sturdy. I might buy another. If you’re looking for a chair that won’t break the bank but looks good, this is the one. I’m pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Stylish Chair
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two tan leather-look and one blue jean fabric chairs. They are very sturdy for heavier and taller people. Easy to assemble alone. Very comfortable. I read the reviews before purchasing and purchased a pillow for each chair to add comfort. I think it works well with or without the pillow. I would purchase these again and I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and easy to assemble, but the grey is much darker than the pictures
reviews.reviewText: These chairs are a great bang for the buck. The cushions are firm, which I like because they wont wear as easily, and they seem very sturdy. They also have a decent width so that a bigger person, such as myself, can rest comfortably in them. However, I expected a more mid tone grey from the pictures, these chairs are more of a dark grey (if you buy the grey color). It's mildly disappointing since the color match I had planned is unfortunately out the window, but they're really nice chairs so I'm going to deal with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice size chair I can sit with my legs up.Its comfortable for sitting long periods of time.It has a great look not cheap at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unbeatable for the price
reviews.reviewText: I knew anything I bought would be better than what I had. I saw a few reviews saying it was uncomfortable, unstable, etc.,I’ve had this for a week now and I’ve been using it every day, and while I do have a couple of gripes, they’re minor. The chair is very very stable, it sits level, the beige faux leather is VERY soft feeling, it does actually look and almost feel like real leather. You can tell it’s not because it does feel thinner. Think mid 2000s Honda leather, if you’ve ever owned a Honda car or minivan. That’s what it feels like. Assembly was also easy. The 4 legs have 4 included bolts each, and the Allen key is provided as well, and the seat back just drops into place, although it did take some finagling with the bottom cushion to get the seat back to slide all the way in. Once put together everything is sturdy and level.It does have a 300 pound weight limit. I am at that 300 pound weight limit. When I sit in it, it doesn’t wobble, it doesn’t feel like it’s going to collapse, it doesn’t scream out in pain, either. So big thumbs up on the build quality there! It does need to be said that I don’t slam down into the chair either, primarily because it does in fact sit high enough to easily get in and out of, which is absolutely a god send for me with my bad back and arthritic knees. The arms are very high up and stable, I can gently sit, and gently stand back up. A massive improvement over my last chair.I saw people gripe about the size and it being too small for tall people, I’m 6’3, 300 lbs. This chair is almost perfect. Size wise, no complaints.My only complaints are two:The seat back is too straight, not enough angle to it. Some people may prefer this, I don’t, however a pillow takes care of that.The cushion does flatten out quickly and wrinkle. It’s not very thick. It’s firm, but with a comfortable amount of give, but the wrinkles aren’t particularly sightly.All in all though, I do give it 5 stars because the value is unbeatable. A brand new chair for less money than picking up a beat up used one on Facebook marketplace is a get. I will probably buy a couple more for other rooms in my house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chair arrived before the said date. Good instructions and easy to put together. A bit larger/wider than I expected but fits perfectly where I had intended it to go. The blue color is just like the pictures shown. The material is better than I thought it would be. A sturdy chair. For an inexpensive piece of furniture, I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful yellow chairs. We bought two. Very comfortable 😌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my daughter's room. Easy to assemble, comfortable, and a great look.
